name: Justified - Raylan Writing Sheets
description: Did you wake up this morning thinking it was another opportunity to mess up some bad guy's day? If so, these Justified - Raylan writing sheets are for you! In honour of our favourite Deputy U.S. Marshal who loves to shoot first, ask questions later, these writing sheets are the best thing this side of Harlan. Each stationery pack contains 15 sheets of paper. This wonderfully geeky design is professionally printed on smooth finish matte text paper (90 gr/m² weight, 92 brightness) and measures approximately 5.25" x 8.25" or 135mm x 205mm (A5 size). Folded in half, the stationery will fit perfectly in any standard A2 envelope. Each stationery pack comes packaged in a clear, resealable cello bag.
